text: The Line 1 of Hefei Metro () is an underground metro line in Hefei. The line began operation on 26 December 2016. ==Opening timeline== {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse; text-align: right;" !Segment!!Commencement!!Length!!Station(s)!!Name |- |style="text-align: left;"| Hefei — Jiulianwei | 26 December 2016 | | 23 |style="text-align: left;"| Phase 1 & 2 |} ==Train service== There are 2 types of train services offered on the metro line 1: *
